message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV 

This paper is about Neural Machine Translation (NMT), which is a subfield of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and falls under the Computer Science category. The paper proposes a new method to use monolingual data for NMT training by combining the scores of a pre-trained language model (LM) with the scores of a translation model (TM). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which covers NLP and related topics. The paper also involves training neural networks, which falls under the sub-categories cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Additionally, the paper mentions using image features for NMT, which falls under the sub-category cs.CV (Computer Vision).
